name: resmpti
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), wss(c2, c0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
-| wss(c2, c0)
-| wi(wss(c2, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
-| wss(c2, c0)
-| wi(wss(c2, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c2, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
-| wss(c2, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Restriction of the mapping operation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
